name: Object Battles
description:
Story

In a different dimension, products of companies implemented with AI Chips compete in a 1on1 tournament for fame, recognition, and money. Instead of physical attacks, they generate “talk” moves (more like badmouthing). 

Game sequence

Out of different categories like logical, savage, emotional. The player can choose a move each round out of a category, and a jury rates the comment about the opponent in a score system. Shortly after that, the opponent's move gets rated, and both statements get compared. The winner scores a Game Point. And the next round starts.
